00560    inline int AtomStorage::nAtom() const
00561    { return atomSet_.size(); }

00564    { return ghostSet_.size(); }

00578    /*
00579    * On master processor (rank=0), stored value of total number of atoms.
00580    */
00581    inline int AtomStorage::nAtomTotal() const
00582    {
00583       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00584       return nAtomTotal_.value();
00585       #else
00586       return atomSet_.size();
00587       #endif
00588    }

00590    // Template method definition
00591 
00592    /*
00593    * Count the number of atoms in this Group and this AtomStorage.
00594    */
00595    template <int N>
00596    int AtomStorage::countGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00597    {
00598       Atom* ptr;
00599       int nAtom = 0;
00600       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00601          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00602          if (ptr) {
00603             if (ptr->isGhost()) {
00604                UTIL_THROW("Found ghost atom");
00605             }
00606             ++nAtom;
00607          }
00608       }
00609       return nAtom;
00610    }
00611 
00612    /*
00613    * Set pointers to atoms in a Group<N> object.
00614    */
00615    template <int N>
00616    int AtomStorage::findGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00617    {
00618       Atom* ptr;
00619       int nAtom = 0;
00620       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00621          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00622          if (ptr) {
00623             group.setAtomPtr(i, ptr);
00624             ++nAtom;
00625          } else {
00626             group.clearAtomPtr(i);
00627          }
00628       }
00629       return nAtom;
00630    }
00631 
00632 }
